about_the_game:
Choose your own character, choose multiple branching storylines, A NEW GAME EVERY TIME YOU PLAY. Explore the open-world , determine the fate of the story, join various factions, learn diverse skills, and be friends with chivalrous heroes. Who you become? It's all up to you.

Be Anyone

Embark on diverse life paths with dozens of radically different starting points, each featuring unique growth curves and exclusive storylines for an immersive experience of different life journeys.

Dynamic Tree-Structured Plot

Featuring a branching, multi-line plot akin to galgames, the story evolves in markedly different directions based on player choices. If players choose not to intervene, the plot develops organically in a completely authentic martial arts world.

Open-world martial arts game

Explore a vast martial arts realm filled with a variety of events, adventures, surprises, or chance encounters, changing over time for players to explore freely.

Forge Bonds with Like-Minded Companions

Roaming the martial arts world should never be a solitary journey. Heroes, legends, and confidantes await, just a chance encounter away.

Multiple Ways to Complete Missions

Confronted with mission objectives, choose to overpower with brute force, execute with clever finesse, or even unravel the underlying intricacies to unexpectedly resolve events.

Join Various Sects

In the bustling martial arts world, select the sect of your preference, inherit their martial arts, and master their unique skills.

Hundreds of Martial Arts Techniques

Choose from nine series and hundreds of distinct martial arts techniques, including blades, swords, fists, fingers, spears, and mystical techniques. It's all at your disposal to craft your unique martial artist.

Deep Combat System

Building upon the traditional martial arts strategy model, additional systems such as obstacles and weather conditions are introduced to recreate the thrilling battles found in martial arts works.

Extremely High Replay Value

Incorporating a rich external growth and unlock system, each game world is brimming with variables, ensuring that every playthrough offers a "different experience every time" for players in the RPG realm.
